page.title: 08MR. PEPPER-- postman
page.content: Mr.Pepper is our village postman so we asked him about his working day. From Monday to Saturday he gets up at 4:30 am goes to work and begins sorting the letters for Wickham and surrounding areas. He enjoys his job in the summer but too cold in the winter, but he likes being outdoors and likes meeting people. He has been a postman for 16 years. The postoffice itself has changed buildings, the sorting office used to be a stable or carriage house at the back of what was the Vine Inn.At 6:30 he has finished sorting and he goes on one of five different rounds. One half the village is done each morning which we call town one and two, and is roughly divided into top Wickham and the bottom.
